definition: lit. Sima Zhao's intentions are obvious to everyone (idiom)/fig. an open secret
pinyin: Si1 ma3 Zhao1 zhi1 xin1 lu4 ren2 jie1 zhi1

sentences.english: Thought processes that arise at the mind door.
sentences.chinese: 生起于意门的心路历程。

sentences.english: Thought processes that arise at the tongue door.
sentences.chinese: 生起于舌门的心路历程。

sentences.english: How do we go about embarking on this 'inner journey' to understand ourselves?
sentences.chinese: 我们是如何开始这段了解自我的“心路历程”的呢？

sentences.english: Thought processes that arise at the eye door.
sentences.chinese: 生起于眼门的心路历程。

sentences.english: Thought processes that arise at the ear door.
sentences.chinese: 生起于耳门的心路历程。

sentences.english: The controversy has brought the tremendous influence to Lu Xun s heart way course for" revolutionary literature".
sentences.chinese: “革命文学”论争给鲁迅的心路历程带来了巨大影响。

sentences.english: Thought processes that arise at the nose door.
sentences.chinese: 生起于鼻门的心路历程。

sentences.english: Johnnie To abandoned the appearance of the gangster genre but to narrate the feeling course behind the heroes.
sentences.chinese: 杜琪峰放下英雄的外观，讲述英雄背后的心路历程。

definition: to search for sth/to seek/to quest/to explore
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life
to diverge from the main road, also figuratively
lit. sinking and floating/to bob up and down on water/ebb and flow/fig. rise and fall/ups and downs of fortune/vicissitudes
bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
(one's) original intention, aspiration etc/(Buddhism) "beginner's mind" (i.e. having an attitude of openness when studying a subject just as a beginner in that subject would)
